sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default class Profile extends Component { state = { alesReq: null, sgk: null, experience: null, ALESResult: null, englishExamResult: null, referenceLetter: null, referenceLetter2: null, statementOfPurpose: null, ALESResultInput: null, experinceInput: null, passport: null, passportInput: null, permissionLetter: null, permissionLetterInput: null, mastersTranscriptInput: null, }; upload = async (event) => { const target = event.target; const name = target.name; var fileInput = event.target.files[0]; var fileName = event.target.files[0].name; var myHeaders = new Headers(); myHeaders.append("Authorization", window.localStorage.getItem("token")); var formdata = new FormData(); formdata.append("title", name); formdata.append("document", fileInput, fileName); var requestOptions = { method: "POST", headers: myHeaders, body: formdata, redirect: "follow", }; fetch("http://commerchant.herokuapp.com/documents/upload/", requestOptions) .then((response) => response.text()) .then((result) => console.log(result)) .catch((error) => console.log("error", error)); }; render() { return (

{" "} Master

{this.state.passportInput} {this.state.mastersTranscriptInput} {this.state.passportArea} {this.state.permissionLetterInput} {this.state.ALESResultInput} {this.state.experinceInput}
{/* Right */}

); } }
